Title: Qur’an with Tajwīd: Tajwīd for Beginners
Subtitle: Correct & Fluent Qur'an Recitation with Tajwīd for Beginners

FAQ.Question: Is it just theory?
FAQ.Answer: No. It is practical Tajwīd applied directly to reading.

FAQ.Question: Can I start with zero Arabic knowledge?
FAQ.Answer: Yes. The course is designed for complete beginners.

FAQ.Question: Is Tajwīd difficult for beginners?
FAQ.Answer: No. It is taught through repetition and applied practice, not theory.

FAQ.Question: Will I be able to read with Tajwīd confidently?
FAQ.Answer: Yes. Fluency and Tajwīd exercises prepare you for independent recitation.

FAQ.Question: How are mistakes corrected?
FAQ.Answer: With patient guidance and repeated correction — never pressure.

Sections.Heading: About Course
Sections.Content: A structured program that teaches Tajwīd from the beginning while helping students read the Qur’an correctly and fluently. Focuses on pronunciation, basic Tajwīd rules, reading confidence, and love for the Qur’an.

Sections.Heading: Who is it for?
Content: Students who read but make mistakes
Students who want to learn Tajwīd rules from scratch
Learners who need structured guidance and practice

Sections.Heading: Course Structure
Content:
Tajwīd Fundamentals (Practical & Applied)
  • Noon & Meem Sakinah
  • Ghunna
  • Qalqalah
  • Heavy & light letters
  • Stops & pauses

Sections.Heading: What Will You Achieve
Content: Respect and love for the Qur’an
